about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi, I'm Rene Krajnc, a Web Developer with a passion for building impactful digital solutions. My journey began transitioning from an infantry soldier to a software engineer, and I've since gained experience in a variety of technologies and industries. I enjoy tackling complex problems and continuously learning new skills.

seo.title: About Rene Krajnc | Web Developer
seo.description: Learn about Rene Krajnc's journey from infantry soldier to Web Developer, his passion for building impactful digital solutions, and his experience with modern web technologies.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, interesting projects, or just having a chat about technology and development. Feel free to reach out through email or connect with me on social media.

fishing.title: Fishing with Grandpa
fishing.subtitle: Join us on an exciting sea fishing adventure targeting the Mediterranean's finest game fish

countdown.title: Countdown to Our Fishing Trip
countdown.description: We're heading out to sea on September 19th, 2024 at 15:00 Slovenian time. Get ready for an unforgettable fishing experience!

targetFish.title: Target Species
targetFish.description: We'll be targeting some of the most exciting and challenging fish species found in the Mediterranean waters.

descriptions.amberjack: Powerful fighters known for their strength and acrobatic jumps. A true test of skill and equipment.
descriptions.barracuda: Fast and aggressive predators with razor-sharp teeth. They provide explosive strikes and thrilling battles.
descriptions.bonito: Swift swimmers that offer fast-paced action and excellent table fare. Perfect for light tackle fishing.
descriptions.grouper: Bottom-dwelling giants that require patience and strength. Known for their powerful runs and stubborn fights.
descriptions.tuna: The ultimate game fish - fast, strong, and relentless. A true trophy that tests every aspect of your fishing skills.
descriptions.mackerel: Fast-moving schooling fish that provide constant action and are perfect for beginners and experienced anglers alike.

rods.title: Premium Fishing Rods
rods.description: High-quality rods designed for sea fishing, featuring the perfect balance of strength and sensitivity for detecting bites and fighting powerful fish.

reels.title: Professional Reels
reels.description: Durable saltwater reels with smooth drag systems, capable of handling the strongest runs from Mediterranean game fish.

tackle.title: Specialized Tackle
tackle.description: Carefully selected lures, hooks, and terminal tackle optimized for targeting specific species and maximizing catch rates.

experience.title: Years of Fishing Experience
experience.description: With decades of combined experience fishing the Mediterranean waters, we've learned the secrets of successful sea fishing and can't wait to share this adventure with you.

seo.title: Fishing | Rene Krajnc
seo.description: Join Rene Krajnc and his grandpa for an exciting sea fishing adventure in the Mediterranean. Countdown to September 19th, 2024 fishing trip targeting amberjack, barracuda, bonito, grouper, and more.
